attributes.action: Boris Johnson must take the UK out of the EU
attributes.additional_details: Parliament is going against the will of the majority of people and constituents to block this country leaving the EU. Under the pretext of 'preventing no deal' Parliament is trying to stop brexit altogether. Boris Johson must do his job as PM and take this country out of the EU on 31st October.
attributes.background: Parliament must stop blocking the democratic vote of the UK and Boris Johnson be allowed to take the UK out of the EU on 31st of October with or without a deal. If the EU will not agree a deal suitable for the UK we must leave without one. We voted to leave, we must have the vote honoured
